dt-example.title: Bootstrap modal
dt-example.info:
This example shows the `r-init responsive.details.display` option being used with the `modal` option, which, when used with the Bootstrap integration for Responsive, will use Bootstrap's native modal display.
In this case the `r-init responsive.details.renderer` returns a table showing the full contents of the row, plus an `-tag h4` tag for the modal title. The Bootstrap modal code for Responsive will automatically move `-tag h2`, `-tag h3` and `-tag h4` elements into the title from the node returned by the rendering function.
